reporting-org.narrative: European Commission - DG Neighbourhood and Enlargement Negotiations

title.narrative: Strengthening of Israeli veterinary diagnostic capacities

description.narrative: To strengthen the capacities of the Kimron Veterinary Institute (MARD) and supervision of private accredited laboratories to achieve rapid and effective surveillance and control of animal diseases as well as provision of reliable evidence to certify animals and animal-origin products as safe, especially for human consumption, up to EU and OIE standards.

title.narrative: Twinning Call for Proposals - Strengthening of Israeli veterinary diagnostic capacities
Status of capacities at headquarters and field level in epidemiological investigations and disease control management

title.narrative: Status of capacities at headquarters and field level in epidemiological investigations and disease control management

description.narrative: Reported results indicators by the European Commission ¿ International Cooperation and Development (DEVCO) may not represent the complete set of indicators monitored for the project. The results are reported using a contribution approach. This means that where a project has been financed by the EU jointly with other funders ¿ such as partner country governments or other donors ¿ the overall outputs of the collective effort are reported rather than outputs attributed to the share of funding provided by the EU. For higher levels of results, such as outcomes and impacts, the project will only have contributed to the overall effort.

baseline.value: weak capacities for epidemiological investigations and disease control management

comment.narrative: weak capacities for epidemiological investigations and disease control management

target.value: capacities for epidemiological investigations and disease control management developed

comment.narrative: capacities for epidemiological investigations and disease control management developed

actual.value: capacities for epidemiological investigations and disease control management strengthened
